00020 #include "TriangleMeshImplicit.h"
00021 #include "assert.h"
00022 
00023 namespace brics_3d {

00025 TriangleMeshImplicit::TriangleMeshImplicit() {
00026         vertices = new std::vector<Point3D> ();
00027         vertices->clear();
00028 
00029         indices =  new std::vector<int> ();
00030         indices->clear();
00031 }
00032 
00033 TriangleMeshImplicit::~TriangleMeshImplicit() {
00034         if (vertices != NULL) {
00035                 vertices->clear();
00036                 delete vertices;
00037         }
00038         if (indices != NULL) {
00039                 indices->clear();
00040                 delete indices;
00041         }
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 std::vector<Point3D>* TriangleMeshImplicit::getVertices() {
00046         return vertices;
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00050 void TriangleMeshImplicit::setVertices(std::vector<Point3D>* vertices) {
00051         if (this->vertices != NULL) {
00052                 this->vertices->clear();
00053                 delete this->vertices;
00054         }
00055         this->vertices = vertices;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 std::vector<int>* TriangleMeshImplicit::getIndices() {
00060         return indices;
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void TriangleMeshImplicit::setIndices(std::vector<int>* indices) {
00065         if (this->indices != NULL) {
00066                 this->indices->clear();
00067                 delete this->indices;
00068         }
00069         this->indices = indices;
00070 }

00072 
00073 int TriangleMeshImplicit::getSize() {
00074         assert((static_cast<int>(indices->size()) % 3) == 0); //plausibility check if index triples are consistent
00075         return (static_cast<int>(indices->size()) / 3);
00076 }
00077 
00078 int TriangleMeshImplicit::getNumberOfVertices() {
00079         return (static_cast<int>(vertices->size()));
00080 }
00081 
00082 Point3D* TriangleMeshImplicit::getTriangleVertex(int triangleIndex, int vertexIndex) {
00083         /* check if parameters are in range */
00084         assert ((0 <= triangleIndex) && (triangleIndex < this->getSize()));
00085         assert ((0 <= vertexIndex) && (vertexIndex <= 2));
00086 
00087         return &((*vertices)[triangleIndex + vertexIndex]);
00088 }
00089 
00090 int TriangleMeshImplicit::addTriangle(Point3D vertex1, Point3D vertex2, Point3D vertex3) {
00091         assert((static_cast<int>(indices->size()) % 3) == 0); //postcondition
00092 
00093         /* append at end */
00094         vertices->push_back(vertex1); //TODO: check for duplication?
00095         indices->push_back(static_cast<int>(vertices->size())); // important: must follow a vertices->push_back()
00096         vertices->push_back(vertex2);
00097         indices->push_back(static_cast<int>(vertices->size())); // important: must follow a vertices->push_back()
00098         vertices->push_back(vertex3);
00099         indices->push_back(static_cast<int>(vertices->size())); // important: must follow a vertices->push_back()
00100 
00101         assert((static_cast<int>(indices->size()) % 3) == 0); //precondition
00102         return this->getSize();
00103 }
00104 
00105 void TriangleMeshImplicit::removeTriangle (int triangleIndex) {
00106         assert (false);//TODO: implement
00107         assert((static_cast<int>(indices->size()) % 3) == 0); //plausibility check if index triples are consistent
00108 }
00109 
00110 void TriangleMeshImplicit::homogeneousTransformation(IHomogeneousMatrix44 *transformation) {
00111         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(vertices->size()); ++i) { // propagate transformation to triangles
00112                 (*vertices)[i].homogeneousTransformation(transformation);
00113         }
00114 }

00116 void TriangleMeshImplicit::read(std::istream& inStream) {
00117 
00118 }
00119 
00120 void TriangleMeshImplicit::write(std::ostream& outStream) {
00121         for (int i = 0; i < this->getSize(); ++i) {
00122                 outStream << (*vertices)[i] << std::endl;
00123         }
00124         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(indices->size()); ++i) {
00125                 outStream << (*indices)[3*i] << ", ";
00126                 outStream << (*indices)[3*i + 1] << ", ";
00127                 outStream << (*indices)[3*i + 2] << std::endl;
00128         }
00129 }
